attributes.action: Give the British public an extra bank holiday for the royal wedding
attributes.additional_details: As proud British citizens, it's our patriotic duty to celebrate the royal nuptials. And in these times of Brexit, we need an event like this to bring the country together - particularly when the Royal Family are one of the most distinctive British assets we can boast as a nation.
attributes.background:
The entire country is currently celebrating the joyous news of the engagement of Prince Henry of Wales, and Meghan Markle.

We wish the Government to declare their wedding day a bank holiday, in line with the bank holiday awarded for the wedding of the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge.
